title: Mark Hart - Lectio Divina: Introduction to a Person
description:
Mark Hart - Lectio Divina: Introduction to a Person [audio presentation]

Presented by Lighthouse Catholic Youth: Have you ever tried to read the Bible but didnâ€™t really know how or where to start? In this talk, Mark Hart beautifully explains how to read, meditate on, and bring to life the Sacred Scriptures through a technique called, "Lectio Divina." Find out how this form of prayer can help you enter into a deeper and more prayerful experience with the Lord.
 
https://www.lighthousecatholicmedia.org/store/title/lectio-divina
